tool_description: Extract information from business documents like invoices
name: Smart OCR
title: Smart OCR

api_list.name: Extract Invoice Information
api_list.description: Extract products, customer, and price information from PDF or image
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://smart-ocr3.p.rapidapi.com/ocr/invoice"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "smart-ocr3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://smart-ocr3.p.rapidapi.com/ocr/invoice"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "smart-ocr3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
